articles.title: Groundbreaking split liver transplant gives the gift of life to two different patients
articles.description: It's the gift of life times two. Innovative technology allowed North Texas doctors to use one donated liver for two different transplant patients.
articles.content:
It's the gift of life times two. Innovative technology allowed North Texas doctors to use one donated liver for two different transplant patients.
It wasn't long after Luna Sifuentes' birth that her parents felt something was wrong.

articles.title: Newport News allocates big money to big Memory Day music festival
articles.description: The event is intended to feature "internationally recognized" musicians and presentations by "notable thought leaders" from the business and technology fields.
articles.content:
Newport News is about to throw big money at the creation of an event designed to attract some big names in music and business innovation to promote the city as a cultural destination.
City Council approved a $3.03 million grant Tuesday to help launch... [1153 chars]

articles.title: Leaders Dental Strengthens Global Competitiveness With CAD/CAM-Based Digital Prosthetics Technology
articles.description: SEOUL, South Korea, Dec. 12, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- As the global CAD/CAM-based digital prosthetics market continues to grow rapidly, the importance of laboratories equipped with advanced automation and precision manufacturing capabilities is rising. Leaders Dental Laboratory is enhancing its competitiveness in the global digital prosthetics sector through its extensive clinical case experience and its mastery of advanced digital equipment operations.
articles.content: SEOUL, South Korea, Dec. 12, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- As the global CAD/CAM-based digital prosthetics market continues to grow rapidly, the importance of laboratories equipped with advanced automation and precision manufacturing capabilities is rising. L... [1192 chars]

articles.description: HCLTech’s 2025 Sydney Partner Advisory Council (PAC) brought a broad cross-section of Australia’s technology leadership together for a closed-door str...
articles.content:
The session was held behind closed doors and attended by senior executives from OpenAI, Oracle, Salesforce, Google, AWS, SAP, Dell, ServiceNow and other partners operating across the ANZ market.
Boardroom conversation focused on changing customer buy... [3870 chars]

articles.title: Oracle's 14.4% plunge weighs on Wall Street
articles.description: The Nasdaq experienced a one-week low as Oracle's significant AI spending plans overshadowed a dovish Federal Reserve. Oracle's stock plummeted after its quarterly forecasts missed expectations, raising concerns about its AI cloud strategy burning cash. Technology stocks, including Nvidia and Broadcom, also declined, impacting the S&P 500 and semiconductor index.
